title: 19th Annual Brooklyn Children’s Book Fair
description: Brooklyn Museum’s Beaux-Arts Court (Prospect Heights) hosts the annual children's book fair.

title: Grand Central Holiday Fair
description: Grand Central Terminal’s Vanderbilt Hall (Midtown East) hosts the holiday fair.

title: CJ Hendry Flower Shop
description: Artist CJ Hendry opens a brick-and-mortar shop in Soho where her plush flowers are priced at $10 each.

title: Designing Women Market
description: The New York Historical (UWS) hosts the Designing Women Market.

title: A Current Affair Pop-Up Vintage Marketplace
description: Industry City (Brooklyn) hosts a vintage marketplace.

title: The Annual WFMU Record + CD Fair
description: Metropolitan Pavilion (Chelsea) hosts the annual record and CD fair.
cost: $10 general admission (save $3 with coupon), $30 early entry 10am-1pm sat

title: Macy’s Holiday Square Outdoor Market
description: Herald Square and Greeley Square host Macy's Holiday Square Outdoor Market.

title: Wall to Wall Stevie Wonder
description: A joyful, FREE, all-day tribute to the iconic Stevie Wonder at Symphony Space.
address: Symphony Space, 2537 Broadway & 95th Street, New York, NY 10025

title: 41st Westbeth Flea Market
description: Shop clothing, jewelry, books, housewares, and more at the annual Westbeth Artists Housing flea market. $10 bag sale on 11/15.

title: The Fourth Annual Gingerbread NYC: The Great Borough Bake-Off at MCNY
description: The Museum of the City of New York (East Harlem) invites bakers to design edible gingerbread displays celebrating the city’s iconic places.
cost: Pay-what-you-can admission for NYC residents (reg. $23 general, $18 seniors, $14 students, free for everyone on Wednesdays)

title: Streb: Into Thin Air
description: The ‘action heroes’ of Elizabeth Streb’s extreme action ensemble execute choreographed feats of extreme athletic and technical skill in their latest performance.
